---
title: "News"
---

The purpose of this page is to capture news from the council, members and the region, including our Pacific and Asian neighbours, that may be of interest to our members and others that visit this site. Please forward relevant information to Garth Tarr, the newsletter correspondent.


## Regional newsletter

A regional newsletter is produced as a means of communicating with members. The first issue of this newsletter was produced in December 2006 for electronic distribution.
